Personal Information

Best Online Traffic School is licensed by the DMV and accepted by EVERY county and court in the state of California. We will electronically submit your results to the court and DMV upon course completion on the same day.

Your ticket citation information can be entered under My Profile or at Check Out after you complete the course.
